text: Inmani'n angkachang pha-ah khat-um angtho thoa ajuosikme tia inlei entok.1:11: angkachang pha-ah khat-um angtho thoa ajuosikme; atu miring kha esik me khat-um ama'n angtik ajuosik me. Atuunna phahi ejei, halli Christa poongna intongpuinasik jarra khat-um ama lurlian nakhan amusik eii tia Christa Ratha'n inmani diang ileikhiinpi kha, atuunna phahin ejei.
